text:
😢Indescribable pain, torment & anxiety of our dog lost for 3 months
💔Not knowing where or how he is
😢Then having the appalling worry of #COVID19 in the family
💔Not being able to even leave the house to look for him 
Please PLEASE , we desperately need your 👀👂 to #FindBertie https://t.co/i309piaCiq
